attributes.action: Ban all sales of fireworks to the public and sell to registered organization only
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I think the sale of fireworks to registered organizations only will:_
1 Cut down on injuries.
2 Make the safety aspect easier to moniter.
3 By arrangement the Fire Service could be on hand
4 Stop the youths buying and setting off fireworks at any time.
5 Help all those pets who suffer severe fright and anxiety due to the indiscriminate use of fireworks.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
